ActCorrections and Conditional Release Act
PrecisAppointment of SUE PERRY of Sherwood Park, Alberta, to be a full-time member of the Prairies Regional Division of the Parole Board of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a period of five years, effective January 8, 2018.
